attributes.action: Stop the Government revoking the British citizenship from British subjects
attributes.additional_details: This bill as is against all morals of this country, it goes against everything the democracy stands for as this is a subtle example of ethnic minority segregation, and racism against people of non British ethnic backgrounds because you are revoking someone of their rights as a British citizen because of their ethnicity. We, as a democratic society need to make a change and not allow the British government to remove British citizenship of an individual without their awareness in advance.
attributes.background: Clause 9 of the bill -  “Notice of decision to deprive a person of citizenship”, now exempts the Government from giving notice to an individual if they deem you are a national security threat. With this bill, the government can deem you a threat and revoke your citizenship without your knowledge.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remove Clause 9 from the Nationality and Borders Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601583

Do not remove anyone's British citizenship: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601611
